GoogleSiteVerificationKey.description: Site verification key for Google Search Console

BingSiteVerificationKey.description: Site verification key for Bing Webmaster Center

FacebookAdmins.description: Admin id for Facebook Insights. Multiple ids can be separated by ','

YandexSiteVerificationKey.description: Site verification key for Yandex Webmasters

AlexaSiteVerificationKey.description: Site verification key for Alexa Console

PinterestSiteVerificationKey.description: Site verification key for Pinterest Console

NortonSiteVerificationKey.description: Site verification key for Norton Safe Web

NaverSiteVerificationKey.description: Site verification key for the Naver Search Engine

TwitterSiteHandle.description: Twitter Site handle to add globally

MetadataGenerators.description: Array with metadata generators. Valid values are OpenGraph, Twitter, SchemaOrg, Citation. Defaults to all three generators if empty.

WikiSeoDefaultImage.description: Default image. Local image, if not set $wgLogo will be used.

TwitterCardType.description: Type of twitter card to use. Defaults to 'summary_large_image'. Possible values: 'summary', 'summary_large_image'

WikiSeoDefaultLanguage.description: Language code and area which will set a <link rel='alternate'> for the current page.

WikiSeoDisableLogoFallbackImage.description: Disable setting the sites logo as the default SEO image if no image was provided.

WikiSeoNoindexPageTitles.description: Array of page titles that should have a robot policy of 'noindex'.

WikiSeoEnableAutoDescription.description: Set to true to try to request a description from textextracts, if no description was given, or the description key is set to 'textextracts'.

WikiSeoTryCleanAutoDescription.description: Set to true, if WikiSEO should try to remove dangling sentences when using descriptions from textextracts.

WikiSeoOverwritePageImage.description: Set to true to enable overwriting the image set by extension PageImages

WikiSeoEnableSocialImages.description: Generate dedicated social media icons for pages

WikiSeoSocialImageIcon.description: The icon/watermark to add to the social media image

WikiSeoSocialImageWidth.description: Width of the social media image

WikiSeoSocialImageHeight.description: Height of the social media image

WikiSeoSocialImageTextColor.description: Color of the text on the social image

WikiSeoSocialImageShowAuthor.description: Show the author of the current page revision

WikiSeoSocialImageShowLogo.description: Show the Wiki logo in the top right corner

WikiSeoSocialImageBackgroundColor.description: Default background color if no page image is found
